t_pc_config Struct Reference


Data Fields

bool pc_enable
unsigned char pc_timer
bool pc_count_enable
unsigned char pc_count
unsigned char pc_max_count
bool warm_enable
bool user_off_pc
bool clk_32k_enable
bool clk_32k_user_off
bool en_vbkup1
bool auto_en_vbkup1
t_vhold_voltage vhold_voltage
bool en_vbkup2
bool auto_en_vbkup2
t_vhold_voltage vhold_voltage2
unsigned char mem_timer
bool mem_allon

Detailed Description

PMIC power control configuration.

Field Documentation

bool auto_en_vbkup1

automatically enable VBKUP1 regulator in the memory hold and user of modes

bool auto_en_vbkup2

automatically enable VBKUP2 regulator in the memory hold and user of modes

bool clk_32k_enable

32 kHz output buffer enable during memory hold

bool clk_32k_user_off

Keeps the CLK32KMCU active during user off power cut modes

bool en_vbkup1

enable VBKUP1 regulator

bool en_vbkup2

enable VBKUP2 regulator

bool mem_allon

memory hold timer infinity mode, If TRUE, the memory hold timer will be set to infinity and the mem_timer filed will be ignored

unsigned char mem_timer

duration of the memory hold timer

unsigned char pc_count

Power cut count

bool pc_count_enable

Power cut counter enable, If TURE, Power cuts are disabled when pc_count > pc_max_count; If FALSE, Power cuts are not disabled when pc_count > pc_max_count

bool pc_enable

Power cut enable

unsigned char pc_max_count

Power cut maximum count

unsigned char pc_timer

Power cut timer value

bool user_off_pc

Automatic transition to user off during power cut

t_vhold_voltage vhold_voltage

output voltage for VBKUP1

t_vhold_voltage vhold_voltage2

output voltage for VBKUP2

bool warm_enable

User Off state enable
